name: 02-Data Preparation
content:
Data Preparation


Dataset Description: The data consists of two related datasets containing customer transaction information and product mapping details from what appears to be a business invoicing system. These datasets are structured to track sales transactions and maintain product categorization.


Customer-Invoice: This dataset contains detailed transaction records with the following key columns:

  • Customer_ID (STRING): Unique identifier for each customer
  • Invoice_Num (STRING): Unique invoice number for each transaction
  • SalesOrder_Num (STRING): Sales order reference number
  • SalesOrder_Dt (STRING): Date when the sales order was created
  • Sales_NetAmount (DOUBLE): Net amount of the sales transaction
  • Invoice_Dt (STRING): Date when the invoice was generated
  • Product_Cd (STRING): Product code identifier
  • Transaction_Type (STRING): Type of transaction (e.g., SS appears to be standard sales)


Product-Mapping: This dataset provides product categorization information:

  • Parent_Prd (STRING): Parent product category identifier
  • Product_Cd (STRING): Product code that links to the Customer-Invoice dataset
